text:
hello everyone

im facing some issue
fields.json file is not uploading in my HubSpot app

Hi there :wave:
Not sure in which channel to post this question:
I want to give one of my team member access to the private app that I created in my app developer account. I thought it should be pretty straightforward to do but... somehow I can't find how to do that :thinking_face:
I tried to invite him directly from my app developer account but he didn't get access to the private app.
Does anyone know how to do that?
Thanks a bunch
Hi team, I have a quick question, can CRM Cards be accomplished on Custom Objects?
Yes, with developer project CRM cards
Hi does anyone know like what will be the redirect URL in app creation in HubSpot.
You'll probably want to put this in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> just to make sure the people that are hiring know about it
:this:  <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> is a more appropriate place for this.  I also recommend reviewing the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|code of conduct>.

In searching for an answer to “Why aren’t rep calls syncing from <http://Outreach.io|Outreach.io> to <http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com>?” I found that activity sync’ing <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/2701652/marketplace/apps/sales/sales-enablement/outreach-data-sync|doesn’t actually work>.  Yikes!  Does anyone have a workaround they’ve implemented?  For example, for emails we BCC HubSpot. What are you doing for calls?

Hi, we had a custom-coded style sheet created in relation to the global menu that displays at the top of every one of the pages in our website.

Unfortunately the HubSpot team have detected a code conflict in the style sheet that’s preventing the drop-down menus from appearing when you hover over each of the main menu items.

Would anyone be able to assist with how this coded style sheet could be fixed so that the drop-down menu functionality is able to work for our main nav menu?
